relation.text: April 1805 My Dear Sister , I arrived

the present Times promise much hope to a Scotchman . As to private matters , I have been deep in the Slough of despond . My John , my faithful & attached John , is no longer my Servant . On Tuesday Morning
the end of this Week . From the moment we do so , all will be
May , as the General Aſsembly opens
makes me melancholy . For these last twelve Years
will not probably write to me for at least Six Months
addreſs your Letter to Edinburgh . I have this day
